data.message:
Looking into starting a no-profit for disaster relief. Food, Clean water, clothes and plush toys, snuggle buddies, for the children to help bring comfort while they resettle.
May just be a toy, but in the hardest of times a toy can be the best company for young minds. I have my Krazy Bear. it means the world to me. 
There are plenty of groups that do these things but with the harsh times falling on this Earth, we need more and must do more.
And there is also Project R.A.G.D.O.L.L. (Robotic Autonmous Genome from the Department Of Life Living) to help spread mental health awareness.

replies.message: You look like the kind of creep that wants to be a child's "snuggle buddy."
I mean, you're cuddling and kissing a guitar 😂😂😂

Been a rough several years yet here we are and taking those steps towards a better minded world one day at a time.
That was from when we were kids, we're adults now and I Would Never To A Child!
Erin young is bad dont listen to her dumb ass

Need to get in gear. Got some info for the right direction but need to do more than collect some stuffed mammals for charity.
Lot of personal noise, addiction and anger issues to work out. 
But we're getting there
